content: bunny buddy is a cute little bunny with a great simple shape it s a great pattern for beginner amigurumi artists use up some stash yarn and make this cutie this listing is for the ad-free pdf pattern for billy the buck only - not a finished product a free version of the pattern is available on my website andshelaughsblog com materials needed d hook 3 25mm worsted weight yarn in 3 colours main colour shirt and stripe colour small amount of pink yarn or embroidery thread for nose 2 safety eyes 8mm fiberfil yarn needle stitch marker scissors finished size the finished bunny is approximately 5-6 tall stitches used mc magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet increase single_crochet increase inv decrease invisible single_crochet decrease see special stitches
